name: On Tario
description:
ON TARIO is a small sci-fi game about a growing city on TARIO, a planet in a galaxy far away made for Ludum Dare 34 (Theme: Growing)

You play as the mayor's technical secretary and will get to know many of the inhabitants of TARIO while doing your daily routine of raising and lowering the city from and into the planet's surface so as to prevail in this hostile environment.

CONTROLS:

- ARROW KEYS

CREDITS:

Code - @iossif

Art - @leafthief

Music & SFX - @cbstegeman / http://www.cb-sound.com/
